thread.title: Three-star forward Mitch Lightfoot commits to Kansas
thread.title_full: Three-star forward Mitch Lightfoot commits to Kansas

author: SI Wire
title: Three-star forward Mitch Lightfoot commits to Kansas
text:
Three-star forward Mitch Lightfoot commits to Kansas Sports Illustrated 3 hrs ago SI Wire © Sports Illustrated Kansas basketball Mitch Lightfoot commits Three-star forward Mitch Lightfoot has committed to Kansas, he announced on Saturday.
Lightfoot, who is the No. 117 recruit in the nation according to Rivals.com, had offers from multiple schools including Arizona, Utah and Stanford.
AdChoices The 6’8”, 210-pound Arizona native averaged 17.9 points, 9.7 rebounds and 3.9 blocks per game in his junior year at Gilbert High School.
Lightfoot is the first commit of Kansas’s 2016 class. He was born in Kansas City, spent his early childhood in the metro area and and still has family that resides there, reports Rustin Dodd of the Kansas City Star.
• GARDNER: Kansas going for 12th Big 12 title in a row
The Jayhawks have three senior forwards, Perry Ellis, Jamari Traylor and Hunter Mickelson, who will graduate after this season.
- Beth Maiman
Go to MSN Home
